'Versus' is the sixth studio album by thrash metal band, The Haunted. This marks
a return to their aggressive sounds in the previous albums after their
experimental fifth album [[The Dead Eye]]. All instruments were recorded live
like their debut album, [[The Haunted (album)|The Haunted]], and solos and
vocals were added once they had the songs down. [http://www.apeshit.org/news/the-haunted-set-versus-as-new-album-
title THE HAUNTED Set Versus as New Album Title] The album is more or less
about the decadence of mankind as last two songs "Faultline" and "Imperial Death
March" point it out.
